text: Yalova is a Turkish city in the northwest, which was affected in the earthquake of 17 August 1999. The city is along the coast of the Marmara Sea. Yalova has a better quality of life from other Turkish cities. It has a population of 77,000. The first people settled in this region in the Prehistoric Period. Twin cities of Yalova are Bonn in Germany and Mahachkala in Russia. Category:Cities in Turkey Category:Marmara Region
title: Yalova
